name: 2024 the 9th International Conference on Distance Education and Learning
content: Publication: All submitted conference papers will be blind peer-reviewed by around 2-3 competent reviewers. After a careful reviewing process, accepted and presented papers into ICDEL 2024 International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1680-5), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus index, like the previous conferences.
